full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Replacement of Service Air Compressor

#### Solicitation Information

* Title: F3065-230006 - Replacement of Service Air Compressor (English) / Remplacement du Compresseur d'Air de Service (French)
* Reference Number: WS3856922662-Doc3856947469
* Solicitation Number: WS3856922662
* Amendment Number: 2 (published on 2023-03-14)
* Publication Date: 2023-02-23
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-17 14:00:00

#### Participant Information

* Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Bidder Requirements

* Interested bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and their bid electronically by 2023-03-17 14:00:00 EDT.
* Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.

#### Contract Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* Country of Service: Canada
* Region of Service: Québec, Québec, Canada
* Required Equipment: Service air compressor for a DNV Ice Class ship, including spare parts, technical documentation, and warranty period.

#### Contact Information

* Delgado Garcia, Oscar (SPAC/PSPC)
* Phone: Not provided
* Email: [oscar.delgadogarcia@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oscar.delgadogarcia@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Address: Not provided

#### Additional Information

* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15510398?extsite=MTU1MTAzOThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Attached documents: None
